altername_name: 克罗罗RPG - 骑士和武士和传说的海盗
name: Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku
overview: Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku is an action role-playing game developed by Namco Tales Studio and published by Bandai Namco Games for the Nintendo DS, which released in Japan in March 2010. The game is based on the Sgt. Frog franchise with gameplay elements adapted from the Tales of series.
